name: TBD FPS
description:
I recently got hold of some snap-together scenery, and built this level to demonstrate some basic elements:movement, mouse-look, multiple weapons, and offensive/regenerative powerups.

To play: 

W - step forward

A - step to the left

S - step backward

D - step to the right

Use the mouse to change which way your facing/aim your weapon

Esc - make the game window take/release the mouse

Left mouse button or Left-ctrl - fire current weapon

1 - select the Self-Recharging Beam Pistol 

2 - select the Hand Grenades, if available

What do you all think should be the next steps with this? Comment at will
